ISSUE.TITLE: Filter products by store not working
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.6.2 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Admin Panel >> Catalog >> Products 2. In the search page select a store & hit search the products don't filter by store When I debugged the code I had noticed the following conditions: if (!showHidden) { //apply store mapping constraints productsQuery = await _storeMappingService.ApplyStoreMapping(productsQuery, storeId); //apply ACL constraints var customer = await _workContext.GetCurrentCustomerAsync(); productsQuery = await _aclService.ApplyAcl(productsQuery, customer); } I think apply store mapping constraints must be outside the if condition.
